option.od: print the help message and exit.
print the RST version number and exit.
verbose. Log information to the console.
filename of the grdmap format file.
the input file is a grd format file.

synopsis.p: Merge line of sight vectors in a grd or grdmap file to produce two dimensional vectors.

description.p: Merge line of sight vectors in a grd or grdmap file to produce two dimensional vectors.
The output in the form of a grd or grdmap file is written to standard output.

example.description: From the grd file "20040830.grd" create a new grid file called "20040830.grd.2" that contains the two-dimensional vector found by merging line of sight vectors.
